name: Decentralized Fact-checking & Provenance Organization (DeFacto) Community Group
description:
The Decentralized Fact-checking & Provenance Community Group (DFCP) is committed to actively researching, developing, building, maintaining, managing, upgrading, and implementing robust amendments for a decentralized fact-checking system and stringent provenance standards for text-based literature and content. We will drive this initiative forward with determination and efficacy.

DFCP strives to empower societies with tools to identify and mitigate/counter misinformation, disinformation, and Fake News at scale.

This group will publish Specifications.
